title: Forsale Imperial cabinet Milwaukee Base Ball Club 1897 Connie Mack
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Forsale Imperial cabinet Milwaukee Base Ball Club 1897 Connie Mack
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jim Manos
Awesome huge imperial cabinet. Has Coonnie Mack in the center 15 x 20 ex condition cameo shots of the players around him all are identified under there picture as well as Milwaukee Base Ball Club of 1897 at the bottom. The unique thing is that it is Connie Mack's last year of playing baseball. If you have the Baseball Registry it is his last yr to play the sport he loved. Not to many piece's with Connie Mack in a Milwaukee uniform. Awesome historical piece. Investment grade condition. $9,000 Call to reserve 614 562 2421

Yes it is. The description is not very goo though...It is Mack's last yr PLAYING baseball he actually is a player manager. HUGE piece. Hope you like it?

posts.post_title: Forsale Imperial cabinet Milwaukee Base Ball Club 1897 Connie Mack
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joe D.
I had no mal-intent.

I sincerely did not understand what was going on at the time of my post... and had I noticed the dates / I still might not have understood - and I just wanted clarification.

Could have easily received a "yes, it was here on b/s/t and is now at the goodwin auction" (with a link).  If anything, I think I offered up a little opportunity to promote the lot in the auction.

Jim's okay by me and I have had cordial telephone conversation / and email correspondence with him in the past...

which is why I was a little surprised with his initial reaction to my post -

and is also why I believe his apology was sincere.
